title: Miami Beach steakhouse will not appeal judge's denial of request for injunction against spring break curfew - Fox News
content:
1. Miami Beach steakhouse will not appeal judge's denial of request for injunction against spring break curfew  Fox News

description: Papi Steak, a tony Miami Beach steakhouse involved in a lawsuit against the city over its emergency spring break curfew order, will not appeal a judgeâ€™s decision to squash an injunction against the controversial crackdown.
